translation.en: [Santa] "…and laying a finger aside of my nose,
I gave him a nod and up the chimney I rose!
translation.fr:
pour le saluer,
avant de remonter par la cheminée.

translation.en: I sprang to my sleigh, gave my flight team a whistle,
translation.fr:
Je repris mon traîneau,
sifflai mon attelage,

translation.en: and away we all flew like the down of a thistle.
translation.fr: et on s'évapora, tels duvets d'un chardon.

translation.en: But I gave him a shout, ere we drove out of sight,
translation.fr: Et en m'éloignant, je leur criai :

translation.en: Merry Christmas to all…"
[kids] And to all a good night.
-Yay! [laughing] -Yes! Ho ho ho ho!
-[clock chimes] -Oh, would you look at that.
-Time for bed, little ones. -[kids] Aww…
Come on, Santa, one more story.
I don't think so. What would your parents say?
translation.fr:
Ça suffit. - Et vos parents ?
- Ils s'en fichent.

translation.en: They won't care.
translation.fr:
- Et vos parents ?
- Ils s'en fichent.

translation.en: -We won't tell. -Please?
Ho ho ho ho! You must have heard every Christmas story there is by now.
translation.fr:
Vous connaissez
déjà toutes les histoires de Noël.

translation.en: Although, there is one tale you may not have heard.
translation.fr: Il en reste peut-être encore une.

translation.en: Honestly, it's kind of…
crazy.
You kids wouldn't want to hear a crazy Christmas story, would you?
translation.fr:
Une telle histoire,
vous n'aimeriez pas ça, non ?

translation.en: [kids] Yeah!
[Santa] Once upon a time, there was a race of aliens known as Klepts.
translation.fr:
Il était une fois, des extraterrestres
appelés Klepts.

translation.en: [Santa] Long ago, they were colorful creatures from a beautiful planet,
translation.fr:
Ils étaient tout colorés
et venaient d'une belle planète,

translation.en: -but they grew greedy. -Ah!
They plundered all their home planet -had to offer… -Hmm. Hmm. Hmm?
-…and their color faded away. -Aw…
So, they took to the stars…
moving from galaxy to galaxy,
swindling, stealing and snatching whatever they could.
translation.fr: et dérobant tout ce qu'ils pouvaient.

translation.en: The poor Klepts had no concept of kindness or joy.
translation.fr:
Ils ne connaissaient
ni la bonté ni la joie.

translation.en: All they ever felt was greed.
translation.fr: Ils ne connaissaient que la cupidité.

translation.en: But the more the Klepts had, the more they wanted.
translation.fr:
Rien ne suffisait,
ils voulaient toujours plus

translation.en: [chuckles] They even stole from one another!
translation.fr: Ils se volaient même entre eux.

translation.en: -Ah! -X was the smallest of the Klepts,
translation.fr: X était le plus petit des Klepts,

translation.en: -but he was also the sneakiest. -Ah.
-[Santa] But no matter how clever X was… -Huh?
-…he was still the smallest. -[laughing]
[Santa] X was an excellent thief…
-but because of his size… -Ah!
translation.fr: mais à cause de sa taille,

translation.en: …the other Klepts -never took him seriously. -[laughing]
translation.fr: on ne le prenait au sérieux.

translation.en: [Santa] The Klepts' supreme leader was a nasty piece of work,
-mean, greedy, and dangerous. -[throne whirring]
Her name was Z.
And Z was about to reveal -her most diabolical plan yet. -[staff clangs]
translation.fr:
Elle allait présenter
son plan le plus diabolique.

translation.en: Klepts, a fabulous treasure is within our grasp.
translation.fr:
Klepts, un trésor fabuleux est
à notre portée.

translation.en: This is Earth, the most stuff-filled planet we've ever seen.
translation.fr:
Voici la Terre, la planète
la plus abondante qu'on ait jamais vue.

translation.en: -Alone and unguarded… -Ooh!
…in the vastness of space.
You almost feel sorry for it.
[chuckles] Almost.
We will build the ultimate weapon: the Gyrotron!
translation.fr:
Nous construirons l'arme absolue :
le Gyrotron !

translation.en: [Z] At the magnetic North Pole of the planet, -it will obliterate the planet's gravity. -[beeping]
translation.fr:
À partir du pôle Nord magnétique,
elle détruira la gravité de la Terre.

translation.en: All the stuff on the surface will float out into space,
translation.fr: Tout se mettra à flotter dans l'espace,

translation.en: where we will be waiting to snatch it up.
translation.fr: et on aura plus qu'à se servir.

translation.en: We will stuff their stuff into our stuff chambers,
translation.fr: On leur prendra tout ce qu'ils ont,

translation.en: and then their stuff will be our stuff!
One of you will go to Earth and assemble the Gyrotron.
translation.fr:
L'un d'entre vous ira
assembler l'arme sur Terre.

translation.en: And let me remind you that failure will be…
frowned upon.
Any volunteers?
[Santa] X knew that if he could steal more stuff -than any Klept in Klept history… -Hmm!
translation.fr:
X savait que s'il volait
plus qu'aucun Klept n'avait jamais volé,

translation.en: …they would finally be forced to take him seriously.
translation.fr: on le prendrait enfin au sérieux.

translation.en: You're volunteering?
I was hoping for someone a bit taller.
Okay, the job is yours, little Klept.
translation.fr: Soit, je te confie cette mission.

translation.en: Impress me.
[Santa] X had been assigned a Semi-Automatic-Multi-Tasking-Unit,
translation.fr:
X reçut
une unité multitâche semi-automatique

translation.en: -or SAMTU. -[X grunting]
[Santa] And little did X realize just how helpful SAMTU would turn out to be.
translation.fr:
X ne savait pas encore
à quel point UMSA lui serait utile.

translation.en: -[squeaking] -[barks]
[Santa] Of all the places to build their weapon of doom,
translation.fr: De tous les sites où construire leur arme,

translation.en: the Klepts chose the North Pole…
translation.fr: les Klepts choisirent le pôle Nord,

translation.en: right in the heart of Christmas Town…
just two days before Christmas Eve!
And who would be the first line of defense against this alien invasion?
translation.fr:
Qui défendra donc la Terre
contre cette invasion extraterrestre ?

translation.en: A handful of elves.
[girl giggles] Hold still, let me put your ribbon on.
translation.fr: Allez. Je te mets le ruban.

translation.en: [woman] Now, say "ah."
[girl] Mom, help! Try your father's auto-bow.
translation.fr:
- Maman, à l'aide !
- Prends la machine de papa.

translation.en: Point it at the puppy and push the button.
His gadgets are great… mostly. [chuckles]
[gasps] Yay! You look perfect!
-Mom, we can't give this one away. -[panting] Look at those eyes.
translation.fr: On la garde. Ses yeux sont magnifiques.

translation.en: -Giving is what Christmas is all about. -I know.
translation.fr: On donne, à Noël. Je sais. Mais elle est si mignonne !

translation.en: But she's such a good girl!
translation.fr: Je sais. Mais elle est si mignonne !

translation.en: [Santa] When X laid eyes on Christmas Town,
he didn't see magic and wonder.
translation.fr: il ne vit ni magie ni merveille.

translation.en: He only saw all the stuff he could steal.
translation.fr:
Il ne vit
que tout ce qu'il pourrait voler.

translation.en: [Santa] It's in a Klept's nature to steal, -so, Christmas Town was a paradise for X. -Wow!
translation.fr:
Voler est dans la nature des Klepts.
Le village était un paradis pour X.

translation.en: As SAMTU led him to the precise spot where they would build the Gyrotron,
translation.fr:
Tandis qu'UMSA le menait
au site de construction,

translation.en: X couldn't help but pilfer.
translation.fr: X ne pouvait s'empêcher de chaparder.

translation.en: [Santa] X didn't know it, but he had arrived on a particularly special night.
translation.fr: Il ignorait l'importance de cette nuit.

translation.en: On the other side of town, I was presenting our newest invention.
translation.fr:
À l'autre bout du village,
je présentais notre dernière invention.

translation.en: You're on, big guy. Three, two…
Hello-ho-ho, everyone!
And thank you for coming.
I know how busy you all are, but you're my family,
translation.fr:
Vous êtes tous occupés,
mais vous êtes ma famille,

translation.en: and I have something incredible to show you.
translation.fr: et j'ai une chose à vous montrer.

translation.en: Everybody loves a baby! They're soft and cute.
translation.fr:
On aime les bébés,
car ils sont doux et mignons.

translation.en: So, it's no wonder the planet is bursting with more kids than ever before.
translation.fr:
Il y a donc de plus en plus d'enfants
sur Terre.

translation.en: Friends, we need a faster method for delivering gifts.
translation.fr:
Il nous faut un système
de livraison plus rapide.

translation.en: I had a vision, a dream!
translation.fr: J'ai eu une vision. C'est un rêve !

translation.en: I saw us bringing gifts to every girl and boy on the face of the Earth at the speed of light!
translation.fr:
Livrer des cadeaux aux enfants de toute
la planète, à la vitesse de la lumière !

translation.en: And with the help of our lead mechanic, Obie,
translation.fr: Grâce à Obie, notre chef mécanicien,

translation.en: -we have made my dream a reality! -[applause, cheering]
Elves, snowmen, citizens of the North Pole, may I present to you,
translation.fr:
Elfes, bonshommes de neige,
citoyens du pôle Nord, je vous présente,

translation.en: the deluxe, fully loaded,
gravity-defying Santa Super Sleigh!
I named it myself.
-My dad made that! -Yes, he did.
Okay, here we go.
-Hi! Oh! Oh, that's not good. -[alarm beeping]
-Whoa! -I have a feeling that this year will be the most crackerjack Christm-- Ahh!
translation.fr: Ce Noël sera le meilleur qu'on…

translation.en: -Whoa! Santa! Watch out! -[screams]
Not good.
Let me turn the… No! Ah! Whoa!
Okay, okay, no, it's okay. No, no, no, no.
Santa?
Santa, are you okay?
[chuckles] Well, that wasn't part of the plan, but it was fun!
translation.fr: C'était pas prévu, mais c'était amusant.

translation.en: Everyone okay?
Sorry, the light-speed booster still isn't quite up to--
translation.fr: Désolé, c'est pas encore au point…

translation.en: Christmas Eve is tomorrow! How will we deliver gifts without the Super Sleigh?
translation.fr:
Le réveillon, c'est demain !
Et les cadeaux ?

translation.en: [chuckles] There's plenty of time!
By midnight tomorrow, the sleigh will be in perfect working order.
translation.fr: Le traîneau sera prêt à temps.

translation.en: I have full faith in Obie.
Okay.
Yeah.
-Are you okay? -I'm fine. I just--
translation.fr:
Ça va ? - Oui. J'ai du travail.
- Attends, tu ne rentres pas ?

translation.en: I really gotta get back to work. Wait, you're not coming home?
translation.fr:
- Oui. J'ai du travail.
- Attends, tu ne rentres pas ?

translation.en: I can't, I… I'm sorry.
The sleigh is my responsibility, and I can't let Santa down.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas décevoir le père Noël.

translation.en: But I'll be home later to tuck you in. I promise.
Okay, I understand.
Noelle, I'm… I'm trying my best.
translation.fr: Noelle, je fais de mon mieux.

translation.en: We know you are.
I'll make it up to her. I'll find her the best Christmas gift ever this year.
translation.fr:
Je lui trouverai le meilleur cadeau
de Noël.

translation.en: The only gift she wants is you.
You get that sleigh fixed and come home to us.
-[doll 1] Mama. -[doll 2] Papa.
[doll] Mama.
Mama.
[Santa] It was just one more day until Christmas.
translation.fr: On était à la veille de Noël.

translation.en: My flight crew and I made the final plans for our first light-speed delivery.
translation.fr:
On faisait les derniers préparatifs
de la 1re livraison ultra rapide.

translation.en: But not everyone was feeling the Christmas spirit.
translation.fr: Mais l'esprit de Noël manquait à certains.

translation.en: And back home, Obie's family was missing him.
translation.fr: Et Obie manquait à sa famille.

translation.en: [Santa] One downside of the gravity-destroying Gyrotron
is that some assembly is required.
[Santa] Whenever a Klept is completely out of options,
translation.fr: Lorsqu'il n'a pas d'autre choix défensif,

translation.en: their final resort is to play dead.
It was X's job to assemble the Gyrotron,
translation.fr: C'était à X de monter le Gyrotron,

translation.en: -but he had better things to do. -Hmm.
So, he reprogrammed SAMTU to do the job for him.
translation.fr:
Il reprogramma UMSA
pour qu'elle le fasse à sa place.

translation.en: [Santa] X knew his mission was top priority,
translation.fr: X savait l'importance de sa mission,

translation.en: but he couldn't stop thinking -about Christmas Town. -Ooh.
translation.fr:
mais il n'arrêtait pas
de penser au village.

translation.en: [Santa] Up above him, there was so much stuff just waiting,
translation.fr: Il y avait là-haut tant de choses,

translation.en: begging, to be taken.
I don't know what's wrong,
but the light-speed booster won't work. I know my calculations are right, but…
translation.fr:
Ça ne marche toujours pas.
Mes calculs sont bons, mais…

translation.en: -Maybe they're not. -[X groans]
[Santa] I'm sure they're perfect. -If anyone can do this, it's you. -[X gasps]
translation.fr:
Ils sont corrects, Obie.
Personne d'autre ne peut y arriver.

translation.en: -[Santa] I'll let you get back to work. -[Obie] Okay.
Thanks, Santa.
Hello?
Somebody there?
[Obie] Hello?
Oh, just a toy. What are you, a doll?
Mama.
-Nice. -Papa.
Hey, hey! I know someone who's gonna just love you.
translation.fr: J'en connais une qui va t'adorer.

translation.en: Holly? You up?
Good night, Sugarplum.
Sorry I haven't been, uh…
I'm just sorry.
[whispers] Merry Christmas.
-[Santa] In that moment… -Huh?
…X felt something he'd never felt before.
-Something he didn't even have a word for. -Ah…
But we do.
-It was love, pure and sweet. -Ah.
translation.fr:
C'était tout simplement l'amour,
pur et tendre.

translation.en: X wanted to forget about this strange feeling.
But like it or not, he was trapped.
translation.fr: Mais il n'y pouvait plus rien.

translation.en: Who are you?
Dad, Dad, it's perfect!
How did you find it?
Where's Dad?
Work? That's okay.
He needs to fix the sleigh, I know.
Oh, did you see what Dad got me?
I did not.
It's a doll!
And I don't quite know what kind of doll,
but I think there's something special about it.
[Santa] There's nothing quite like Christmas Eve in Christmas Town.
translation.fr: Noël au village est vraiment unique.

translation.en: There's a spirit of joy that spreads through every household.
translation.fr: On ressent de la joie partout.

translation.en: A deep appreciation for those we love
translation.fr:
On éprouve
de la gratitude pour nos proches

translation.en: and the precious time we get to spend together.
These feelings were brand new to X
-and made him feel awfully strange. -[tinkling]
-And as the day went on… -[elves caroling]
…X witnessed everyday acts of kindness and generosity.
translation.fr:
X vit des gestes de gentillesse
et de générosité.

translation.en: He saw how the elves loved to sing songs, give gifts, to smile and laugh.
translation.fr:
La façon dont les elfes adoraient chanter,
donner des cadeaux, sourire et rire.

translation.en: What utterly strange creatures these elves were.
There was so much wonderful stuff to steal! They should be taking, he thought.
translation.fr:
Tant de choses merveilleuses à voler !
"Allez-y", pensa-t-il.

translation.en: Yet they were not stealing a thing!
It all made no sense to X.
translation.fr: Ça n'avait aucun sens pour X.

translation.en: -[Holly] Are you leaving, too? -Huh?
You don't have to pretend.
translation.fr: Je savais que tu faisais semblant.

translation.en: I knew you could walk. You're not very good at hiding it.
translation.fr: Je savais que tu faisais semblant. Tu joues mal la comédie.

translation.en: It's okay. You can have whatever you want.
translation.fr: Vas-y, prends ce que tu veux.

translation.en: It's just stuff.
-Why are you leaving? -Um…
Do you have to go to work, too?
That's okay. I understand.
Wait here.
-[panting] -Here you go.
Nobody likes being alone, especially on Christmas.
translation.fr: Personne n'aime être seul, surtout à Noël.

translation.en: [Santa] X finally understood how wonderful it was to receive a gift.
translation.fr:
X comprit enfin le plaisir
de recevoir un cadeau.

translation.en: -It was so much better than stealing! -[gasps]
translation.fr: C'était bien mieux que de voler !

translation.en: Because a present wasn't just meaningless stuff.
translation.fr: Un cadeau, ça signifie quelque chose.

translation.en: It meant someone cared about him.
An act of love like that?
Well, it didn't just change X on the inside.
[Santa] X felt amazing!
And he wanted, more than anything, to share this feeling,
translation.fr: Et il voulait partager ce sentiment.

translation.en: to show Holly that he cared about her just as much.
translation.fr: Qu'Holly sache qu'il tient à elle aussi.

translation.en: But what could X give her that she didn't already have?
translation.fr: Mais il ne savait quoi lui offrir.

translation.en: As they raced through Christmas Town, -X told Holly everything. -Whoa!
translation.fr:
Alors qu'ils traversaient le village,
X lui raconta tout.

translation.en: He told her about the Klepts and Supreme Leader Z
translation.fr: Des Klepts et de Z, leur cheffe suprême,

translation.en: -and what he was sent here to do. -What?
He told her he wasn't going to do that anymore.
translation.fr: Il la rassura. Il le voulait plus.

translation.en: Instead, he'd come up with a wonderful new plan, just for Holly.
translation.fr: Pour elle, il élaborerait un nouveau plan.

translation.en: X, look out!
Be careful.
[Santa] With SAMTU successfully reprogrammed, X was ready to begin his plan.
translation.fr:
UMSA reprogrammée,
X mit son plan à exécution.

translation.en: Dad? Dad?
I don't know where my dad is.
translation.fr: Je sais pas où est papa.

translation.en: With a new sleigh, our delivery time will be cut by 90%!
translation.fr: Ce traîneau nous fera gagner du temps !

translation.en: Uh… Santa?
Obie? Is everything okay?
Well, not exactly.
I… I couldn't fix it.
I tried everything. It just won't work. My math must have been wrong, and I…
translation.fr:
J'ai essayé. Ça ne marche pas.
J'ai dû me tromper et…

translation.en: I'm sorry. I… I failed you, and I ruined Christmas.
translation.fr:
Désolé. Je vous ai déçu
et j'ai gâché Noël.

translation.en: I've put a lot of pressure on you this year, haven't I, old friend?
translation.fr: Cette année, je t'ai mis la pression.

translation.en: I have, and I'm sorry.
How about we look at this sleigh together and see what we can do.
translation.fr: Tentons de trouver une solution ensemble.

translation.en: What do you say?
Hey, Santa?
Uh, just in case we can't get the sleigh to work, do you have a plan B?
translation.fr:
Si on n'y arrive pas,
vous avez un autre plan ?

translation.en: Ho-ho-ho! Nope.
Fixing the Super Sleigh might have been difficult for Obie,
translation.fr: Obie avait échoué dans les réparations,

translation.en: but for SAMTU, light-speed engine repair
-was well within his programming. -Ah.
You did it! You did it!
Obie, you were pranking me! [laughs]
How wonderful!
Uh… I, uh… Just a second, Santa.
Dad!
-What's going on? How-- -It was X! The doll you gave me.
translation.fr: Que se passe-t-il ? Comment… X ! Ma poupée.

translation.en: He's not a doll, he's an alien! He came to steal.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- C'est un extraterrestre ! - Bien.
- Il était venu voler.

translation.en: But I gave him a puppy, and he changed colors!
translation.fr:
Je lui ai donné un chiot,
puis il a changé de couleur !

translation.en: And he has a robot.
The robot was doing bad things.
X reprogrammed him, then we came here, and his robot fixed the sleigh!
translation.fr:
X l'a reprogrammé
pour qu'il répare le traîneau !

translation.en: I… But why?
So we can all be together on Christmas.
That was X's present to me.
Thank you.
[Santa] X was the first Klept in history -to give a gift… -Hmm.
translation.fr:
X fut le premier Klept
à offrir un cadeau.

translation.en: …and it felt even better than he had hoped.
The little alien was imbued with the spirit of Christmas.
The fully-loaded Super Santa Sleigh was ready to rip!
translation.fr: Le super traîneau de Noël était fin prêt !

translation.en: And Obie and Holly were together.
translation.fr: Et Obie et Holly étaient ensemble.

translation.en: [Santa] A perfect, happy ending for our Christmas tale.
translation.fr:
Une parfaite fin heureuse
à notre conte de Noël.

translation.en: I never said this Christmas story had a happy ending. -I said this story was crazy! -[elves screaming]
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais promis de fin heureuse.
J'ai dit que c'était incroyable !

translation.en: Bet you forgot about old Z, didn't you?
[chuckles] Well, she didn't forget,
and was here to finish the job.
translation.fr: et était venue achever son plan.

translation.en: Activate the Gyrotron!
Destroy Earth's gravity and take everything!
translation.fr:
Détruisez la gravité
de la Terre et prenez tout !

translation.en: Alien attack! Retreat! There's too many of--
translation.fr:
À l'abri ! Ils attaquent !
Ils sont trop n…

translation.en: Secure the north wall with the Ice Brigade!
Aerial reindeer support to the west!
The battle for Christmas Town had begun.
-Mom's at the kennel! We have to go! -You're right. Stay close!
translation.fr:
- Maman est au chenil ! Allons-y !
- T'as raison.

translation.en: [Santa] X knew that the Gyrotron -could still be activated… -Ah!
translation.fr:
X savait que le Gyrotron
pouvait être activé.

translation.en: -…so he sent SAMTU to check on it. -[beeping]
Get the sleigh to safety!
Nobody messes with my holiday!
Oh! Oh, boy! This complicates things.
-Let's round them all up. -[barking]
Come here, little guy.
Heads up. Puppy coming your way.
This is kind of fun, once you get used to it.
translation.fr: C'est amusant, une fois qu'on s'habitue.

translation.en: -[Holly gasps] -[Noelle] What's wrong? We got this, Mom.
[Holly] Yes!
Will someone please blast that miserable thing out of the sky?
translation.fr:
Qu'on abatte
cette chose horrible immédiatement !

translation.en: -Oh, no! -[X screaming]
-[gibbering gratefully] -Forget about it. It's what we do.
translation.fr: T'inquiète. On est là pour ça.

translation.en: [Santa] It was a devastating loss.
Christmas Town had fallen,
and the Klepts were triumphant.
[doll squeaks] Mama.
Come closer so I can see you.
You deviated from my plan.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas suivi mon plan.

translation.en: Klepts!
I would like you to meet your new -Vice Supreme Leader! -Huh?
translation.fr:
Je vous présente
votre nouveau vice-chef suprême !

translation.en: X has shown more unscrupulous treachery -than all of you combined. -Huh.
translation.fr:
X s'est montré
plus malhonnête que quiconque ici.

translation.en: He assembled the Gyrotron,
gained the trust of these moronic creatures
translation.fr: a gagné la confiance de ces idiots

translation.en: and led us right to the best stuff we have ever seen!
translation.fr: et nous a menés à toutes ces merveilles !

translation.en: -[Z cackles] -[Santa] Once upon a time, this would have been everything X could have ever wanted.
translation.fr:
Il était une fois,
c'était le désir ardent de X.

translation.en: But when he saw Holly, X knew what he had to do.
translation.fr: Mais quand il vit Holly, X sut quoi faire.

translation.en: -[panting] -What are you doing? What in the-- Ah!
What's happening to me?
I feel so… warm.
-[tinkling] -It's… It's…
it's wonderful!
[Santa] For so long there had been an emptiness -inside the Klepts… -[growls]
translation.fr:
Pendant longtemps,
les Klepts ressentaient un vide,

translation.en: …that no amount of taking could ever fill.
translation.fr:
qui ne pouvait être comblé
par leurs vols.

translation.en: -[squeaks] -Merry Christmas.
-[Klept] Hmm… Hmm! Aw… -[Santa] But now, thanks to X,
that hollow space was filled with love…
and transformed by the spirit of Christmas.
translation.fr: et transformé par l'esprit de Noël.

translation.en: Yes, it was this new concept of giving that changed the Klepts.
translation.fr:
C'est le fait de donner
qui changea les Klepts.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
[Santa] They were restored to the colorful creatures they once were.
translation.fr:
Ils avaient retrouvé
leurs couleurs perdues.

translation.en: [Santa] It's Christmas.
The sun's coming up.
Children will wake up, and there'll be nothing under their trees!
translation.fr: Les enfants n'auront pas de cadeaux !

translation.en: And there's not enough time to deliver the gifts.
[Santa] Yes, that little X surprised them all that day.
translation.fr: Ce petit X les étonna ce jour-là.

translation.en: [Santa] He may have been the smallest of Klepts, but it turns out
translation.fr: C'´était peut-être le plus petit Klept, mais il avait aussi le plus grand cœur.

translation.en: -he had the biggest heart. -Ah!
translation.fr: mais il avait aussi le plus grand cœur.

translation.en: [Santa] And as dawn broke on Christmas morning,
translation.fr: Et à l'aube, le matin de Noël,

translation.en: the world could never have predicted just how special,
translation.fr:
le monde n'aurait pu imaginer
que ce jour serait si spécial,

translation.en: how unique, how…
…alien it would be.
The Klepts helped deliver toys in an armada of spaceships.
translation.fr:
Grâce à leurs vaisseaux,
les Klepts livrèrent les cadeaux.

translation.en: Faster than the speed of light!
Just like my vision!
Sort of.
It was all thanks to a little girl
translation.fr: Tout ça grâce à une petite fille,

translation.en: and an even littler alien,
and a whole lot of love.
And that is the story of the very first Alien Christmas.
translation.fr:
Et c'est l'histoire
du premier Noël extraterrestre.

translation.en: The end.
